description: Modifies some of the properties of the specified resource share.

parameters.name: resourceShareArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share that you want to modify.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Specifies a unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This lets you safely retry the request without accidentally performing the same operation a second time. Passing the same value to a later call to an operation requires that you also pass the same value for all other parameters. We recommend that you use a UUID type of value.. If you don't provide this value, then Amazon Web Services generates a random one for you. If you retry the operation with the same ClientToken, but with different parameters, the retry fails with an IdempotentParameterMismatch error.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: owningAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: allowExternalPrincipals
nested_items.description: Indicates whether principals outside your organization in Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
True --- the resource share can be shared with any Amazon Web Services account.
False --- the resource share can be shared with only accounts in the same organization as the account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource share.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the resource share.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag key and value pairs attached to the resource share.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, attached to the tag. Every tag must have a key. Key names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The string value attached to the tag. The value can be an empty string. Key values are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource share was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource share was last updated.

nested_items.name: featureSet
nested_items.description: Indicates what features are available for this resource share. This parameter can have one of the following values:

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: The idempotency identifier associated with this request. If you want to repeat the same operation in an idempotent manner then you must include this value in the clientToken request parameter of that later call. All other parameters must also have the same values that you used in the first call.
